description:
Archer of Red was originally http://anidb.net/ch92255 [Rottweil Berzinsky]`s Servant. Her current Master is http://anidb.net/ch88727 [Shirou Kotomine]. She wishes to use the Grail to protect the children of the world.
[spoiler="True Name and Noble Phantasm"]Her true name is Atalanta, a famous huntress known as the Chaste Huntress that appears in Greek Mythology. She is famous for her swift feet in Ancient Greek legend and included as a member of the Argonauts, which assembled brave heroes from all over Greece.
Her Noble Phantasm is Phoebus Catastrophe, which unleashes a devastating rain of arrows down on the enemy.[/spoiler]
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
name: Aka no Archer
